To be great you have to be coached hard.

To be coached hard you have to get out of your feelings.

To get out of your feelings you need to stop caring about outside voices.

Be patient with ourselves: 

We‚Äôre going to make mistakes. 

It‚Äôs part of the process of growth. 

When we do, patience will help us:

‚Ä¢ overcome it
‚Ä¢ learn from it
‚Ä¢ continue on

1. Patient

‚ÄúBe patient‚Äù is the first pillar of mindset. We must be patient in 3 ways:

‚Ä¢ with ourselves
‚Ä¢ with our teammates
‚Ä¢ with the process

So what does each mean?
